author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

In order to remove empty unused plots, FakeHLT DQM and NoHLT validation is added to reco and HARVEST steps of 2017 and 2018 data.
Only Run3 wfs should run HLT DQM and Validation and present.

#### PR validation:

Tested with: runTheMatrix.py --nThreads=10 --list=250202.181,28234.0,25202.0,23434.999,12434.0,11634.0,10824.0,10224.0,10042.0,10024.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No
title: Add Reco and HARVEST FakeHLT steps
